item.title: Avoiding Undesired Future with Minimal Cost in Non-Stationary Environments
item.description: AUF-MICNS: A novel sequential method efficiently solves the avoiding undesired future problem by dynamically updating influence relations in non-stationary environments while minimizing action costs.
